Ordentlich

The terrific & neat theme for the Ghost blogging platform.
Responsive and fresh.

About Ordentlich

Ordentlich is the terrific and neat theme for Ghost. It's free, responsive and ready to rumble!

It's brought to you by HAPPY CODING

See it live in action on for example pages like Coding w/ Passion Mag.

Ordentlich is heavily using Bourbon, Neat, Bitters and the nice flex boxes.

Install Ordentlich

Build the theme using gulp as described on the official Github page.

Visit Github page
